doc.previous: In November 2011, Allegiant closed its Long Beach facility and consolidated all Los Angeles area flights at Los Angeles International (LAX).
doc.after: The corporate headquarters are in Enterprise, unincorporated Clark County, Nevada.[13][14] Located in a business park built in 2008, the building has "Allegiant" painted on the roof but no such sign on the front. The front desk is a replica of an MD-80 tail.[15]
